data.text: @Subytweets @veerappavenkap1 They turn those things into entertainment. Thali bajao.

@Subytweets @nandtara Dereliction of the bounded duty ( migrants , covid relief etc ) , oppressing huge sections , religious mumbo jumbo ,  misappropriation of public funds , living it up ,  wiling away time / time pass with frivolous speeches  -- a heady mix .
@Subytweets @nandtara What shitty piece of advice did he give in his Monkeybath? And foolish andhbhakts are impressed! Amazing!
@GreyingnCranky @Subytweets If one chooses to share Monkey bath every other Sunday that’s what they end up doing…

@Subytweets How does the PM of a nation of 1.3 billion people & equal number of problems, with several thousand students stuck in a foreign war zone have the time to enjoy tik tok videos and then be so impressed, he actually makes a press statement about it like it's a fcking brilliant idea!
